snippet: The Turkish authorities seized more than 1,200 jackets that would have been sold to migrants and that were made of material that did not float.
lead_paragraph: The Turkish authorities seized more than 1,200 jackets that would have been sold to migrants and that were made of material that did not float.
abstract: Turkish newspaper Hurriyet reports raid on workshop in Izmir by government authorities, who have seized more than 1,200 life jackets, made of material that would not float, that were intended for sale to migrants.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis

headline.main: Turkey: Defective Life Jackets Seized at Workshop
headline.print_headline: Europe; Turkey: Defective Life Jackets Seized at Workshop
